info.title: Ampache REST API
info.description: OpenAPI 3.0 specification for Ampache REST API, based on the official documentation and RESTful path conventions.

ampacheUrl.description: Base URL to your Ampache Server.

format.description: Response format. JSON and XML calls are the same, only the response differs.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication, session management, registration and health endpoints

tags.name: Albums
tags.description: Album browsing, lookup and album-related metadata

tags.name: Artists
tags.description: Artist browsing, artist details and related albums or songs

tags.name: Songs
tags.description: Song browsing, song metadata, lyrics, scrobbling and play history

tags.name: Playlists
tags.description: Playlist creation, editing, deletion and playlist item management

tags.name: Bookmarks
tags.description: Bookmark creation, editing and lookup for media items

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Search endpoints and search rule discovery

tags.name: Catalogs
tags.description: Catalog management, scanning and catalog maintenance tasks

tags.name: Genres
tags.description: Genre browsing and genre-related albums, artists and songs

tags.name: Labels
tags.description: Label browsing and label-related artists

tags.name: Licenses
tags.description: License browsing and license-related songs

tags.name: Browsing, Indexes and Lists
tags.description: Folder-style browsing index and list-style lookup endpoints

tags.name: Streaming and Downloads
tags.description: Media streaming and download endpoints

tags.name: Artwork
tags.description: Artwork retrieval and artwork update endpoints

tags.name: Videos
tags.description: Video browsing and video metadata

tags.name: Podcasts
tags.description: Podcast management and podcast episode endpoints

tags.name: Live Streams
tags.description: Live stream (radio) creation, editing and browsing

tags.name: Shares
tags.description: Public share creation, editing and deletion

tags.name: Social
tags.description: Followers, following, timelines and social interactions

tags.name: Now Playing
tags.description: Playback state, now playing and player updates

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Administrative user management and user-scoped listings

tags.name: Preferences
tags.description: Server and user preference management

tags.name: Maintenance
tags.description: Deleted content and system maintenance endpoints

tags.name: Ratings and Flags
tags.description: Rating, favouriting and flagging of media items

tags.name: Playback Control
tags.description: Localplay and democratic playback control endpoints

tags.name: Utilities
tags.description: Helper and utility endpoints such as metadata lookup and URL conversion

ApiKeyAuthQuery.name: auth
ApiKeyAuthQuery.description: Ampache session token or encrypted API key passed as the auth query parameter.

ApiKeyAuthHeader.name: auth
ApiKeyAuthHeader.description: Ampache auth value supplied via HTTP header authentication (as documented for the auth parameter).

BearerAuth.description: Bearer token authentication. Ampache supports Bearer Token usage for handshake and ping.

get.summary: Get external metadata for an album

post.summary: Flag or unflag an item as favourite

parameters.description: UID of object you are sharing
parameters.name: album_id

post.summary: Update art for an object (Catalog Manager)

get.description: Provide operator plus one or more rule triplets. At minimum, rule_1, rule_1_operator, rule_1_input are required. Additional rules may be supplied as rule_2, rule_2_operator, rule_2_input, etc.

parameters.description: and, or (whether to match one rule or all)
parameters.name: operator

parameters.description: Return results starting from this index position
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Search for media entities using rule triplets

parameters.description: newest, highest, frequent, recent, forgotten, flagged, random
parameters.name: filter

get.summary: Get stats (song/album/artist etc) by type and filter

post.summary: Update artist info and fetch similar artists

post.description: Deprecated in this spec as per implementation guidance. You should provide either Bearer authentication, or auth token parameters.

parameters.description: Passphrase (timestamp + password hash) or API key. Required unless using BearerAuth.
parameters.name: auth

parameters.description: UNIX time used in seed of password hash (required for login/password authentication).
parameters.name: timestamp

get.description: Does not require authentication. If you provide authentication (auth query/header or Bearer), the server may return additional session and library metadata.

parameters.description: Optional session/API key. May extend session and return additional data when provided.
parameters.name: auth

200.description: Ping response (contents may vary based on whether authentication is provided).
